plot outline: Vishal is fed up with his wife Naina and cant get along with her they have their new neighbors Pooja and her husband Vitthal.Before marriage Vishal was in love with Pooja and Vitthal was in love with Naina.They find that both their marriages are not working and decide to file for divorce and later marry the either.They go to advocate Jhatke to file for divorce who tells them they will have to wait for six months but the couples are not ready to wait for such long as they cant stand each other.Jhatke gives them the idea that the couple should swipe their spouses for twelve hours in a day to spend time with each other and asks their servant's Gangya and Saraswati to keep an eye on them.
title: Majha Navra Tujhi Bayko
plot: Complicated marriage lives of two married man.

Vishal is fed up with his wife Naina and cant get along with her they have their new neighbors Pooja and her husband Vitthal.Before marriage Vishal was in love with Pooja and Vitthal was in love with Naina.They find that both their marriages are not working and decide to file for divorce and later marry the either.They go to advocate Jhatke to file for divorce who tells them they will have to wait for six months but the couples are not ready to wait for such long as they cant stand each other.Jhatke gives them the idea that the couple should swipe their spouses for twelve hours in a day to spend time with each other and asks their servant's Gangya and Saraswati to keep an eye on them.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
